thread.section_title: PropertyNow Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PropertyNow | propertynow.com.au
thread.title: John Goschin

author: John Goschin
title: John Goschin
text:
My property leased quickly with PropertyNow!!!
Do not attempt to lease privately via Domain.com.au, you will be charged more than DOUBLE THE PRICE!
Take full advantage of PropertyNow's bulk rate buying power and save a bundle.
Not only do you save money by advertising with PropertyNow, they will make sure your listing advertised in full colour in up to sixteen (16) internet sites:
Domain.com.au
Realestate.com.au plus and additional 14 internet sites.
Call Domain (Fairfax Network) and they completely obfuscate the fact that PropertyNnow exists.
You will be charged their advertised full rate of $387.20
Just work out the savings:
Domain.com.au - Rental listing fee 4 weeks $387.20
Propertynow.com.au Rental listing fee $175.00 to be listed until leased :).
Modifications:
Domain.com.au advertisements are only modified business hours Monday to Friday. "WEEKENDS EXCLUDED".
Propertynow.com.au Modifications can be made 24 hours of the day ðŸ™‚ and your advertisement updates are automatically exported to all websites you're listed on.
You retain all the control. Edit your ad anytime. After hours and weekends included. Now, that's what I call good service!.
I was comforted by the fact that when I engage the services of PropertyNow I am dealing with a professional licensed Real Estate agent.
I found them friendly and very helpful, and I was assisted throughout every step of the way.
I leased my property for the asking price in less than 2 weeks.
My Real Estate agent has if for 6 weeks and failed.
I would highly recommend PropertyOne to anyone looking to quickly get their property rented.
John Goschin
